subject: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
GOOD NEWS ;
Your Urgent Reply is Needed because (UBA Bank) has finalize all the
necessary arrangement of you funds, But i no hare form you long and
$17.9Million is inside the ATM Card this moment you ATM Card is
available waiting for your Address where to deliver,
Contact with your full Information Below.
Full Name:::
Home Address:::
Country:::
P.O. Box Address:::

Email::::::::::

So am inform you that the only delay your $17.9Million is the fee of

Mr. Larry  Kelly
Best Regards,

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for your message and the good news! It's always exciting to hear about new opportunities. I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify a few things for me?

You mentioned an ATM card, is this something that I applied for? Also, you mentioned a fee that needs to be paid. Could you provide more details about what this fee is for?

I'm also curious about the use of a Steam wallet card. How does it relate to the ATM card and the process you described?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Lila

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about this opportunity! Could you please explain a bit more about the ATM card and how it works? Also, could you clarify what the fee is for? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lila

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about the prospect of receiving my funds! Could you please explain a bit more about this process? Why do we need to use a card or Steam wallet card for this transaction? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lila

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about receiving my ATM card! Could you please explain a bit more about why we need to use a Steam wallet card? I'm not very familiar with how they work.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Lila

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm glad to hear that my email has been received. Could you please provide more details about this ATM card package? What exactly does it contain and why is it being sent to me?

Also, could you clarify what the fee is for? Is it a delivery charge or something else? And why specifically a Steam wallet card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lila

subject: Re: GOOD NEWS ;
body:
Hello Mr. Larry Kelly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite excited about the prospect of receiving my funds. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain why there is a need for a fee to stamp the package of the ATM card? Also, why does it specifically have to be an iTunes or Steam wallet card?

I look forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lila
